e.tv Ghana nke a makwaara dị ka ETV Ghana bụ netwọk telivishọn na-agbasa ozi n'efu na-agbanwe awa 24 n'ụbọchị site na Accra kemgbe ọ malitere n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009. Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011 ọ ga-amalite mgbasa ozi ala na Kumasi
E wezụga Accra na Kumasi, ọ dị site na satellite na First Digital TV na SMART TV
Ọ bụ TV nke onwe ya na Accra.
Amụrụ ụlọ ọrụ TV a site na mmekorita dị n'etiti Global Media Alliance (GMA) na Sabido Group, ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna nke e.tv, ọwa mgbasa ozi Bekee kachasị na South Africa
e.tv Ghana na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Global Media Alliance (GMABC).
Edward Boateng bụ Onye isi oche nke Board of Directors na onye ama ama na ihe nkiri na TV nke Ghana Jot Agyeman bụ e.tv Ghanańs Station Manager.
